localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Chrome Extension using the latest AI technology to analyze huge amount of text in milliseconds and auto highlights the most relevant sentences. All for you to save time on web research and not being distracted and overloaded by non-relevant information.
blogPost.body: Chrome Extension using the latest AI technology to analyze huge amount of text in milliseconds and auto highlights the most relevant sentences. All for you to save time on web research and not being distracted and overloaded by non-relevant information.
blogPost.title: AI Chrome Web Highlight - Auto highlights the important sentences on websites with AI
blogPost.author: Talaal Max Habib

localize.description: Chrome浏览器扩展使用最新的人工智能技术，在几毫秒内分析大量的文本，并自动突出最相关的句子。所有这些都为您节省了网络研究的时间，而不会被无关的信息所干扰和超载。
localize.tagline: 用AI自动突出网站上的重要句子。

localize.description: Chrome瀏覽器擴展使用最新的人工智能技術，在幾毫秒內分析大量的文本，並自動突出最相關的句子。所有這些都爲您節省了網絡研究的時間，而不會被無關的信息所幹擾和超載。
localize.tagline: 用AI自動突出網站上的重要句子。

previous.excerpt: Meet Maya your virtual assistant for entrepreneurs. Maya will be running tasks, listening, and communicating on what you need to grow your idea. She will keep you up to date on your current progress and provide the next step you need to take.
previous.title: Maya Ai - The virtual assistant for entrepreneurs and startups

localize.description: 认识一下您的创业者虚拟助理Maya。玛雅将负责执行任务，倾听并沟通您发展想法所需的内容。她会让您了解您当前的进展，并提供您需要采取的下一步措施。
localize.tagline: 创业者和初创企业的虚拟助理。

localize.description: 認識一下您的創業者虛擬助理Maya。瑪雅將負責執行任務，傾聽並溝通您發展想法所需的內容。她會讓您瞭解您當前的進展，並提供您需要採取的下一步措施。
localize.tagline: 創業者和初創企業的虛擬助理。
